column5: Friend of mine fished the area for the first time a couple of weeks ago, had some success and saw loads of potential. Asked me to join him this coming weekend and considering how vast an area it is I was wondering if those who have fished and/or have knowledge of the Bay would be willing to share any info. Many thanks in advance to your replies.

id target smallies or pike...  the pickerel really have turned off in the bay as a whole as they are dispersed into the deeper parts of the lake. The big pike are also out in the deeper water. Bass seem to stay a bit more reasonably closer to the mainland.
